findings.chest: The bases of the lungs demonstrate atelectasis.

abdomen.liver: Homogeneous in attenuation with no focal lesion identified.
abdomen.pancreas: Without pancreatic duct dilatation and no focal lesion identified.
abdomen.spleen: Normal in size with an accessory spleen incidentally noted.
abdomen.adrenal_glands: Within normal limits and without nodularity.
abdomen.kidneys: Present symmetric nephrograms and excretion of contrast.

left_kidney.cyst: 8.6 x 6.6 cm hypodensity most compatible with a simple cyst.

left_ureter.stone: 7.6 x 8.3 mm high density focus at the left ureteropelvic junction, thought to represent a stone.

abdomen.duodenal_diverticulum: Approximately 3.0 x 3.3 cm extending from the second portion.

sigmoid_colon.bowel_wall_thickening: 15 cm loop with surrounding inflammatory changes.

abdomen.abdominal_aorta: Normal in caliber without aneurysmal dilatation.
abdomen.lymph_nodes: Scattered retroperitoneal and mesenteric nodes seen which do not meet CT size criteria for pathology.

pelvis.inguinal_areas: Small fat containing bilateral inguinal hernias noted.

findings.lesions: No suspicious lytic or blastic lesion is identified.
